reviewText: Heartwarming story, with beautiful music, and a beautiful Daniel Brhl.
We loved the movie once we could watch it. It has an area restriction and would not play on or DVD player. Had to watch it on our computer, much smaller screen!
I love it. A story about a boy who is growing up  to have a lot of experiences, Arbo is finding himself and last fase( in a bus )in so beautiful.
